step1.title: Join FENAM
step1.description: Become a member of the National Federation of Multicultural Associations to access our experiences.

step2.title: Book your dinner
step2.description: Choose from available dinners and book your seat for a unique gastronomic experience.

step3.title: Make a donation
step3.description: Complete your participation with a voluntary donation to support association activities.

spirit.title: The spirit of ENOTEMPO dinners
spirit.description: Our dinners are moments of authentic conviviality, where tradition and innovation meet. A warm and welcoming atmosphere, selected wines and carefully prepared dishes, to create unforgettable experiences that celebrate Italian gastronomic culture.

donationBox.title: Important: Voluntary donations
donationBox.description: All amounts paid on the ENOTEMPO website are voluntary donations linked to association activities. These are not payments for commercial services, but contributions to support the National Federation of Multicultural Associations (FENAM) and its cultural initiatives.

newsletter.title: Stay updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates on events, dinners and Enotempo initiatives.
newsletter.success: Thank you! You have been subscribed to our newsletter.
newsletter.privacyNote: Your data is processed in accordance with the

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.

fenam.title: FENAM â€“ National Federation of Multicultural Associations
fenam.description: FENAM is the National Federation of Multicultural Associations, an organization that promotes encounters between different cultures through cultural initiatives, events and themed dinners. FENAM membership is mandatory to participate in ENOTEMPO dinners.
fenam.requirement: To participate in ENOTEMPO dinners, FENAM (National Federation of Multicultural Associations) membership is mandatory. Without FENAM registration, it is not possible to complete the reservation.

form.title: FENAM Registration
form.privacy: I have read and accept the privacy policy and authorize the processing of my data.
form.dataConsentLabel: I have read and accept the
form.dataConsentLink: privacy policy on personal data processing
form.dataConsentError: You must accept the privacy policy to proceed.
form.donationNote: After submitting your data, you will be asked to complete a VOLUNTARY DONATION for FENAM affiliation. This is a contribution to support association activities, not a payment for commercial services. Without donation, the registration will not be valid.
form.success: Registration submitted. Now proceed to donation.

events.title: Our dinners
events.fenamRequired: FENAM membership is mandatory to participate in the dinner. If you are not yet registered, register before completing the reservation.

reservation.title: Reservation
reservation.fenamConfirm: I confirm that I am a FENAM member.
reservation.dataConsentLabel: I accept the processing of my data for reservation management and communications related to the event. I have read the
reservation.dataConsentLink: privacy policy on personal data processing
reservation.dataConsentError: You must accept the data processing to proceed.
reservation.success: Reservation submitted! To complete your participation, please make the donation for the dinner.

fenam.title: Donation for FENAM affiliation
fenam.description: This is a donation to support the FENAM association. It is not a commercial service payment.
fenam.body: Your FENAM registration has been successfully recorded. The donation is voluntary and helps support the association's activities.
fenam.skipDonationNote: You can participate in FENAM activities even without making a donation at this time.
fenam.paypalSuccess: Thank you! Your donation has been recorded by PayPal.
fenam.paypalCancel: You have cancelled the donation. You can try again later or continue without donating.

dinner.title: Donation for dinner participation
dinner.description: This is a donation to support the FENAM association and the event. It is not a commercial service payment.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Relive the best moments of our ENOTEMPO dinners. A journey through the gastronomic experiences that have brought people and cultures together.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have questions or want to know more about ENOTEMPO and FENAM? We're here to help.

form.name: Name
form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

chefs.pageSubtitle: The people who give a face, a flavor and a story to Enotempo experiences.
chefs.empty: We are updating our team of chefs and collaborators.

aboutSection.title: Our chefs and collaborators
aboutSection.subtitle: A multicultural team that combines technique, memory and research to create experiences consistent with Enotempo's vision.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy on Personal Data Processing
privacy.intro: This page describes how we use your personal data in the context of Enotempo activities.

fenam.title: FENAM Registration
fenam.body: Data provided through the FENAM registration form is used to manage membership, internal communications, and organization of related activities.

events.title: Event Reservations
events.body: Data provided for dinner reservations is used to manage event participation and send you any logistical communications.

general.title: General Data Processing
general.body: Your personal data is processed in accordance with current privacy regulations. We do not use aggressive marketing tracking and we are committed to protecting your privacy. Data is retained only for the time necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.
